title: Enter your details
p1: You must enter your details exactly as they're written on the case, including any mistakes. For example, if your last name is Smyth but it has been spelled 'Smith', you should enter Smith

id.required: Enter your submission reference exactly as it's written on the ET1 claim form
id.invalid: You entered an invalid submission reference. Submission reference should be 16 numeric characters in 123456789123456 or 1234-5678-9123-4567 formats
id.submissionReferenceNotFound: Submission Reference not found. The entered submission reference does not match our records

claimantName.required: Enter your full name exactly as it's written on the ET1 claim form

hiddenErrorField.api: Unable to assign you to your case. Please try again later
hiddenErrorField.invalidCaseDetails: Please enter the details exactly as they are written on the case, including any mistakes
